header.title: Enable the Sámi keyboards in macOS 10.9-10.12

body.p: To be able to write easily in Sámi, you need to use a Sámi keyboard. On this page we describe how to enable it.
If you need a keyboard layout other than North sámi, then you first need to install the desired keyboard.
2. Click Keyboard or type a relevant search term in the search field:
3. Click on the Input Methond tab and click on the plus sign in the lower left corner:
4. Select the Sámi keyboard you want, and click add:
5. Finally choose the Sámi keyboard in the keyboard menu to the right in the menu list when writing Sámi:
6. For å bytte raskt mellom ulike tastatur kan du bruke tastekombinasjonen Cmd-mellomrom (⌘-␣ ).
